data.title: JoAnn Williams Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Lottie JoAnn Williams. 85 a resident of Henryetta, Oklahoma, passed away, Friday, August 2nd, 2024 in Henryetta, Oklahoma.  JoAnn was born September 28th, 1938 in Altus, Arkansa...
data.text:
Lottie JoAnn Williams. 85 a resident of Henryetta, Oklahoma, passed away, Friday, August 2nd, 2024 in Henryetta, Oklahoma. JoAnn was born September 28th, 1938 in Altus, Arkansas to Rena Reese (Winn) Martin and Elmo Dobbins.

JoAnn is preceded in death by one daughter, Deborah Marie Williams Smith, infant son, Steven Wayne Williams, husband, Jerry Lee Williams, parents, Rena Reece (Winn)Martin and Elmo Dobbins and one sister, Linda Collette.

JoAnn was born in Altus, Arkansas but moved to Henryetta during her school years due to her fathers work. JoAnn met and married her late husband in Henryetta and would marry June 2nd, 1956 at the Henryetta Church of Christ. They would be blessed with three children. JoAnn was a homemaker for many years before starting a career in Operations at Coleman's Drive-in in Okmulgee. JoAnn retired upon the closing of the restaurant and would become the Secretary at Hoffman First Baptist Church for a short time. JoAnn loved her family, spending time with her grandchildren and great-grandchildren was a favorite pastime. She was a wonderful cook, especially her pecan pies and German cake that everyone loved!

Those left to cherish JoAnn's memory are her daughter, Brenda Luellen of Henryetta, grandchildren, Lacretchia Ramsey and husband Dustin of Tecumseh, Oklahoma, Tiffany Myers and husband Chuck of Bixby, Oklahoma, Krista Free and husband Daniel of Wister, Oklahoma, Randy Luellen Jr. and wife Jamie of Bixby, Oklahoma , Nikki Ray and husband Cory of Wister, Oklahoma and a host of great-grandchildren, other relatives and dear friends.

JoAnn was much loved and will be greatly missed.

Officiating: Brother Casey McIntosh

Those serving as pallbearers: Marty Williams, Randy Luellen Jr., Dustin Ramsey, Adrian Ramsey, Chuck Myers and Austin Johnson.

Honorary Pallbearers: Colt Free and Dylan Free

Visitation is scheduled for 3:00PM to 8:00PM, Tuesday, August 6th, 2024 at Integrity Funeral Service. 410 E. Trudgeon St., Henryetta, Oklahoma

Funeral Service is scheduled for 2:00PM Wednesday, August 7th, 2024 at Integrity Chapel, 410 E. Trudgeon St., Henryetta, Oklahoma.

Interment to follow at Westlawn Cemetery, Henryetta, Oklahoma.

Arrangements and Services under the direction of Integrity Funeral Service, Henryetta, Oklahoma
